name: sophiie-spatial
description: Realtime multimodal workspace: voice, text, and touch create spatial plans

scripts.build: NX_DAEMON=false NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false pnpm exec nx run-many --target=build --projects=customer,admin
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build:customer: NX_DAEMON=false NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false pnpm exec nx build customer
scripts.build:admin: NX_DAEMON=false NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false pnpm exec nx build admin
scripts.worker:tradie: cd apps/api && set -a && source .env && set +a && PYTHONPATH=. python services/voice/tradie_worker.py dev
scripts.worker:customer: cd apps/api && set -a && source .env && set +a && PYTHONPATH=. python services/voice/customer_worker.py dev
